image_8.entity_name: Charlotte's Egg Sac (Egg Sac, Peachy Little Sac)
image_8.description: Charlotte's Egg Sac is an important object in the narrative, symbolizing her 'great work' and containing 514 eggs. It is described as strong, made of the toughest material, and waterproof, ensuring the eggs inside will be warm and dry. Wilbur affectionately refers to it as the 'peachy little sac'.
